attributes.action: pedestrianise Old Compton Street to create a vibrant European style cafe culture in the heart of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Old Compton Street is the heart of Soho, which makes it the heart of London, the Theatre district, the gay scene, tourism central.

It is barely used as a major through-route anyway, and by pedestrianising the bulk of it, the bars and cafe's could put seats outside and create a vibrant, European style street culture that would draw in millions of pounds of tourism spend.

It would also create virtually the only outdoor street space in Centrsl London, something which in Summer is sorely needed.

It could be open to cars between certain hours for loading, and the cross streets (greek street, wardour street etc.) should remain open to traffic so as to ensure there would be minimal disruption to traffic.
